prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered middle section Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the newly created coordinate system. The sketch should consist of the following: * Sketch face 1: + Loop 1: - Line 1: Starting at point [0.0, 0.0], ending at point [0.375, 0.0]. - Line 2: Starting at point [0.375, 0.0], ending at point [0.375, 0.25]. - Line 3: Starting at point [0.375, 0.25], ending at point [0.75, 0.25]. - Line 4: Starting at point [0.75, 0.25], ending at point [0.75, 0.5]. - Line 5: Starting at point [0.75, 0.5], ending at point [0.0, 0.5]. - Line 6: Starting at point [0.0, 0.5], ending at point [0.0, 0.0]. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch by rotating using the euler angles of the coordinate system and translating based on the translation vector. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate a 3D model with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.25 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 * Sketch scale: 0.75 * Operation: Combine to create a new solid body. Part 2: Rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly angled front face Create a new coordinate system, relative to Part 1, with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.125, 0.25] Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the newly created coordinate system. The sketch should consist of the following: * Sketch face 1: + Loop 1: - Line 1: Starting at point [0.0, 0.0], ending at point [0.125, 0.0]. - Line 2: Starting at point [0.125, 0.0], ending at point [0.125, 0.375]. - Line 3: Starting at point [0.125, 0.375], ending at point [0.0, 0.375]. - Line 4: Starting at point [0.0, 0.375], ending at point [0.0, 0.0]. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.375. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch by rotating using the euler angles of the coordinate system and translating based on the translation vector. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate a 3D model with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.25 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 * Sketch scale: 0.375 * Operation: Combine with the existing solid body. Final 3D model: A rectangular prism with a curved top edge Now, create a curved top edge to the final 3D model (Part 2) by performing the following steps: * Create a swept profile based on the last sketch of Part 2, and a 2D curve to define the curved surface. * Define the 2D curve as an arc with center [0.0625, 0.3125], radius 0.1875, starting at angle -90° and ending at 90°. * Perform the sweep operation to create a curved surface on sk ```python top of Part 2. ``` The final 3D model will have the following dimensions: * Length: 0.75 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.25 (including the curved surface)</description>
